title: London, BL, Add. 17252
Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British Library
Cathismata, ܩ̇ܐܬܝ̣̈ܣܡܐ or ܩܬܝ̈ܣܡܐ (καθίσματα), and other hymns, for various festivals.
Dedication of the Church.
Annunciation of Zacharias.
Epiphany.
Encomium of S. John the Baptist, ܛܟܣܐ ܕܩܘܿܠܣܗ ܕܝܘܚܢܢ with ܩܝ̈ܢܬܐ ܕܥܡ̈ܝ̣ܕܐ.
Presentation of our Lord in the Temple.
Fast of Nineveh.
Friday of Priests.
Friday of the Dead.
Friday of Strangers.
Lent, concluding with the commemoration of the forty Martyrs of Sebaste (ܣܒܣܛܝܐ) and ܫܘܒ̈ܚܐ ܡܬܝ̈ܕܥܢܐ ܕܝܘ̈ܡܬܐ ܫ̈ܚܝ̣ܡܐ ܕܨܘܡܐ.
Palm Sunday.
Passion Week.
Troparia.
Easter Sunday.
first order of the Resurrection.
New (Low) Sunday.
second order or tone of the Resurrection, ܩܝ̣ܢܬܐ ܬܪܝܢܝܬܐ ܕܩܝܡܬܐ, and the subsequent tones.
Commemoration of the blessed Virgin.
Ascension.
Pentecost.
Commemoration of S. Thomas.
Transfiguration of our Lord.
Obsequies of the blessed Virgin.
Invention of the Cross.
author: Cyril of Jerusalem
